events.message: I recently received my order, but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the screen and does not look new at all.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the customer's report of a scratched and damaged item received.
A customer support representative has been assigned to the case to handle the reported product defect.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I'd like to help resolve this issue promptly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area and the packaging to help us investigate and assist you better?
Here are the photos showing the scratch on the screen and the box it came in, which appears to be intact without external damage.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement product at no extra charge or a full refund, whichever you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement unit, please. Thank you for your prompt assistance and understanding.
We have processed your replacement order, and it will be shipped within 24 hours with tracking details emailed to you.
We are following up to ensure your replacement product was received in good condition and meets your expectations.
As we have not received any further concerns, your case has been closed. Thank you for your cooperation and patience.
